text: (And those who cry not unto) worship not (any other god along with Allah) among the idols, (nor take the life which Allah hath forbidden) to kill nor declare it lawful to be killed (save in (course of) justice) through stoning, retaliation or apostasy, (nor commit adultery) nor deem adultery lawful (and whoso doeth this) i.e. deem it lawful (shall pay the penalty) a valley in the Fire; and it is said: a well in the Fire;
